title: No Limits - Gamemode Idea
body:
Ever wanted to have 5 Karthus on your team? 
Sure, that's possible in one-for-all.

But how about Jinx with Runnan's?
Yeah, you can do that in a normal game...?

But what about Jinx with 6 Runaans, shooting 13 targets at once?
Now you're interested.

Ever wondered how it would be to have Tiamat on a ranged champion? 
Yep, no attack type restrictions. 

Ezreal main?
Build ALL the Tears.

Point is, this isn't just allowing more than one of the same champion, oh no.

#This is getting rid of the UNIQUE item effects.
And all of them are stackable.

Sadly, with how Riot is pretty desperate atm; rotational gamemodes won't happen... ever for a while.

But if you like the idea, show your support!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

I'm sure all of you would love to see six Luden's dish out more than 3 targets.

EDIT: Lots of you are saying every single thing would be broken in this gamemode.

...it's a fun shenanigan gamemode.
